ygData.subject: Re: Re: SPOILER Cape of the Midnight Mist (was:RE: re: equipment)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... harmonic - A couple of things said druid wanted me to point out about butler room...you already hit one on the head, as usual you are quite astute : ) 1.
ygData.messageBody:
>At level 32, one wrong move and you are dead in the Butler's Room.
>I'm certain a level 32 druid with thistles up could probably knock
>out the butler fairly quickly. But the Butler, like many other
>inhabitants, drops a harm touch (~200 dmg). And if said druid
>agro's the gargoyle that usually stands in there, or agros a
>hallway roamer - KYAG. It's all in the pull vector, and object
>angles that makes the room look really easy, until the unexpected
>may occur. I know, I've been there many many times. Your level 32
>druid will most likely finish the battle at 4o% mana and 5o% health.
>I don't call that easy, I call it doable. =)
> Then again, Harmony works in MM >8)
> Harmonic, not as familiar with Mistmoore as Permafrost, but skilled.

harmonic - A couple of things said druid wanted me to point out about butler
room...you already hit one on the head, as usual you are quite astute : )

1. Harmony works in mistmoore
2. Druid has not killed anything that gives him Bad MM faction. What this
means is that he is Indifferent to MM faction things in Wolf Form. Combine
that with liberal doses of Harmony, and there is very little chance of anything
jumping in (like basically 0%)to aid the butler or the Maid, or the Catliff.
He has killed (since lvl 32, he is now 43) the Butler 2x, the Maid at least 2x,
the catliff enough to get 2 Crested helms, and a truckload of shoulders, the
Cloaked D once. (He hasn't killed Mynthi yet for the drum, but he did e-mail me
a screenshot of him standing next to her while she was holding the drum....just
to irritate me..)

But, the difference between "doable" and "easy" is a matter of opinion. He
INSISTED that i use the word "easy" when describing the Butler....including the
example that it was easier than the Ancient Croc in Upper Guk...he also said
that he does not remeber being harm touched...is it possible that the Butler
(if he spawns) during the DAY does not harm touch, but the one at night does?
He said he just may not remember the HT, but i would think he would remember
that!

Kaleid
23rd song
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus
Yes, there IS a high elf Paladin in my guild...go figure.


=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
